chart_description: The `system.io` chart displays the volume of data being read from (`in`) and written to (`out`) disks in your system. Monitoring this metric can help you identify disk bottlenecks and determine if you need to upgrade your storage solution.

dimension_descriptions.in: The number of kilobytes per second being read from disk.
dimension_descriptions.out: The number of kilobytes per second being written to disk.
